labels.label: Query the db for anything with a change later than the latest"last_change"
For each row returned, set an "_id" so we can do Upsert when ingesting data
Find the latest "last_change" date in ES

entry.value: -- Investigation SELECT last_change_time, phc.public_health_case_uid, phc.program_jurisdiction_oid program_jurisdiction_oid, phc.case_type_cd case_type_cd, phc.case_class_cd, phc.outbreak_name, phc.cd_desc_txt cd_desc_txt, phc.prog_area_cd prog_area_cd, phc.jurisdiction_cd jurisdiction_cd, phc.pregnant_ind_cd pregnant_ind_cd, phc.local_id local_id, phc.rpt_form_cmplt_time rpt_form_cmplt_time, phc.activity_to_time activity_to_time, phc.add_time add_time, phc.activity_from_time activity_from_time, phc.last_chg_time public_health_case_last_chg_time, phc.add_user_id add_user_id, phc.last_chg_user_id last_chg_user_id, phc.curr_process_state_cd curr_process_state_cd, phc.investigation_status_cd, phc.record_status_cd, jc.code_desc_txt jurisdiction_code_desc_txt, act.mood_cd, notification.local_id notification_local_id, notification.add_time notification_add_time, notification.record_status_cd notification_record_status_cd, notification.last_chg_time notification_last_chg_time, nesteddata.act_ids, nesteddata.person_participations, nesteddata.organization_participations FROM --public health case public_health_case phc LEFT JOIN dbo.notification notification ON ( phc.public_health_case_uid = notification.notification_uid ) JOIN nbs_srte.dbo.jurisdiction_code jc ON (phc.jurisdiction_cd = jc.code) JOIN act ON ( phc.public_health_case_uid = act.act_uid ) OUTER apply ( SELECT * FROM ( -- persons associated with public_health_case SELECT ( SELECT p.act_uid AS [act_uid], p.type_cd AS [type_cd], p.subject_entity_uid AS [entity_id], p.subject_class_cd AS [subject_class_cd], p.record_status_cd AS [participation_record_status], p.last_chg_time AS [participation_last_change_time], person.first_nm AS [first_name], person.last_nm AS [last_name], person.local_id AS [local_id], person.birth_time AS [birth_time], person.curr_sex_cd AS [curr_sex_cd], person.cd AS [person_cd], person.person_parent_uid AS [person_parent_uid], person.record_status_cd AS [person_record_status], person.last_chg_time AS [person_last_chg_time] FROM participation p JOIN person ON person.person_uid = ( select person.person_parent_uid from person where person.person_uid = p.subject_entity_uid ) WHERE p.act_uid = phc.public_health_case_uid FOR json path ) AS person_participations ) AS person_participations, -- -- organizations associated with public_health_case ( SELECT ( SELECT p.act_uid AS [act_uid], p.type_cd AS [type_cd], p.subject_entity_uid AS [entity_id], p.subject_class_cd AS [subject_class_cd], p.record_status_cd AS [record_status], p.last_chg_time AS [last_change_time], org.display_nm AS [name], org.last_chg_time AS [org_last_change_time] FROM participation p JOIN organization org ON org.organization_uid = p.subject_entity_uid WHERE p.act_uid = phc.public_health_case_uid FOR json path ) AS organization_participations ) AS organization_participations, -- act_ids associated with public health case ( SELECT ( SELECT act_uid AS [id], act_id_seq AS [act_id_seq], record_status_cd AS [record_status], root_extension_txt AS [root_extension_txt], type_cd AS [type_cd], type_desc_txt AS [type_desc_txt], last_chg_time AS [last_change_time] FROM act_id WHERE act_uid = phc.public_health_case_uid FOR json path ) AS act_ids ) AS b, ( SELECT ( SELECT max(v) FROM ( VALUES -- latest person change time ( ( SELECT max(person.last_chg_time) FROM participation p JOIN person ON person.person_uid = ( select person.person_parent_uid from person where person.person_uid = p.subject_entity_uid ) WHERE p.act_uid = phc.public_health_case_uid ) ), -- public health case last change time (phc.last_chg_time), -- act_id last change time ( ( SELECT max(act_id.last_chg_time) FROM act_id WHERE act_uid = phc.public_health_case_uid ) ), -- notification last change time (notification.last_chg_time), -- participation last change time ( ( SELECT max(p.last_chg_time) FROM participation p WHERE p.act_uid = phc.public_health_case_uid ) ) ) AS value (v) ) AS last_change_time ) AS last_change_time ) AS nesteddata WHERE -- only return results with last_change_time greater than what is already indexed last_change_time > '${es_last_change}' ORDER BY last_change_time ASC;
